title: The Proposal's Jess and Nathan engaged for a second time
text:
They got engaged during the first episode of Channel Seven dating series The Proposal.

And now, months after meeting on the unpopular series, Jess Nooy and Nathan Parks are engaged for a second time.

Paramedic Nathan, 40, popped the question to mother-of-two Jess by the beach at sunset.

'Once wasn't enough!' Months after getting engaged on Channel Seven's The Proposal, Jess Nooy and Nathan Parks are engaged for a second time

Sharing photos of the special moment to Instagram, Jess wrote: 'If once wasn't enough... then twice it was.'

'On bended knee, on the sand, by candlelight, overlooking the ocean, after the most beautiful sunset, on the most perfect night, he asked again...

'And of course once again, I said YES!'

'No cameras or audience, just our own special moment and one I will cherish forever,' Jess wrote on Instagram

Jess added: 'No cameras or audience, just our own special moment and one I will cherish forever!

'I feel like the luckiest woman in the world! We cannot wait for our future together and all the exciting moments just around the corner.'

Following poor ratings for The Proposal, Channel Seven bumped the show to a 9:30pm time slot.

Flashback: They got engaged on the first episode of Channel Seven's The Proposal

The first episode failed to impress viewers, pulling in just 307,000 metro viewers.

The show sees contestants compete in pageant-style rounds in a bid to win the heart of an eligible suitor, before proposing in front of an audience.

The Proposal is hosted by Luke Jacobz and is based on the U.S. show of the same name.
description: They got engaged during the first episode of Channel Seven dating series The Proposal.
